CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordType.Name=$Label.IP_Relocation_I4W_Rec_Type,
SUBSTITUTE(TRIM(
IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c ,"7000"), "7000 ", "")+
IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c ,"8000"), "8000 ", "")+
IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c ,"9000"), "9000 ", "")+
IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c, "9100"),"9100", ""))," ","; "), RecordType.Name)
CustomField.label: Blended Type of Dispenser Platform
